script.name: !init.ship.globalscriptmap.std
script.description: Initialisation for all ships with any race

line.comment: * set default scripts for all ships with any race
* Navigation Commands
* global script map: set: key=[COMMAND_JUMP_STATION], class=[Moveable Ship], race=null, script='!ship.cmd.jumpstation.std', prio=0
* global script map: set: key=[COMMAND_JUMP_SECTOR], class=[Moveable Ship], race=null, script='!ship.cmd.jump.std', prio=0
* global script map: set: key=[COMMAND_JUMP_POSITION], class=[Moveable Ship], race=null, script='!ship.cmd.jumpposition.std', prio=0
* global script map: set: key=[COMMAND_JUMPTOME], class=[Moveable Ship], race=null, script='!ship.cmd.jumptome', prio=0
* global script map: set: key=[COMMAND_FREIGHT_UNLOAD], class=[Freight Drone], race=null, script='!ship.cmd.freightdrop.std', prio=0
* global script map: set: key=[COMMAND_FREIGHT_GET], class=[Freight Drone], race=null, script='!ship.cmd.freightfetch.std', prio=0
* global script map: set: key=[COMMAND_FREIGHT_TRANSFER], class=[Moveable Ship], race=null, script='!ship.cmd.freighttransfer.std', prio=0
* Fight Commands
* Defend position uses the following command:
* global script map: set: key=[COMMAND_KILL_ENEMIES_RANGE], class=[Ship], race=null, script='!ship.cmd.killenemiesrange.std', prio=0
* global script map: set: key=[COMMAND_RETREAT], class=[Ship], race=null, script='!ship.cmd.retreat.std', prio=0
* global script map: ignore: key=[COMMAND_DEFEND_SECTOR], class=[Freight Drone], race=null
*global script map: set: key=[COMMAND_LAUNCH_ALLMARINES], class=[Ship], race=null, script='!ship.cmd.launchmarines.std', prio=0
* Special Commands
* global script map: set: key=[COMMAND_TRANSPORT_PASSENGERS], class=[Ship], race=null, script='!job.special.taxi', prio=0
* global script map: set: key=[COMMAND_MOVE_REPAIR], class=[Moveable Ship], race=null, script='!ship.cmd.moverepair.std', prio=0
* global script map: set: key=[COMMAND_STATION_REBUILD], class=[TL], race=[Argon], script='!god.tl.deliver.factory', prio=0
* global script map: set: key=[COMMAND_STATION_REBUILD], class=[TL], race=[Boron], script='!god.tl.deliver.factory', prio=0
* global script map: set: key=[COMMAND_STATION_REBUILD], class=[TL], race=[Split], script='!god.tl.deliver.factory', prio=0
* global script map: set: key=[COMMAND_STATION_REBUILD], class=[TL], race=[Paranid], script='!god.tl.deliver.factory', prio=0
* global script map: set: key=[COMMAND_STATION_REBUILD], class=[TL], race=[Teladi], script='!god.tl.deliver.factory', prio=0
* global script map: set: key=[COMMAND_STATION_REBUILD], class=[TL], race=[Pirates], script='!god.tl.deliver.factory', prio=0
* global script map: set: key=[COMMAND_STATION_REBUILD], class=[TL], race=[Yaki], script='!god.tl.deliver.factory', prio=0
* global script map: set: key=[COMMAND_STATION_REBUILD], class=[TL], race=[Phanon], script='!god.tl.deliver.factory', prio=0
* global script map: set: key=[COMMAND_STATION_REBUILD], class=[TL], race=[OCV], script='!god.tl.deliver.factory', prio=0
* global script map: set: key=[COMMAND_STATION_REBUILD], class=[TL], race=[Terran], script='!god.tl.deliver.factory', prio=0
* global script map: set: key=[COMMAND_STATION_REBUILD], class=[TL], race=[Goner], script='!god.tl.deliver.factory', prio=0
* global script map: set: key=[COMMAND_DESTROY_THIS], class=[Moveable Ship], race=null, script='!ship.cmd.destroy.std', prio=0
* global script map: set: key=[COMMAND_PREACH], class=[Ship], race=null, script='!ship.cmd.preach.std', prio=0
* Explorer Commands
* Fight/Patrol Jobs
* global script map: set: key=[COMMAND_PATROL], class=[Ship], race=null, script='!ship.cmd.patrol.std', prio=0
* global script map: set: key=[COMMAND_PATROL_SINGLE], class=[Fighter], race=null, script='!ship.cmd.patrol.single.std', prio=0
* global script map: ignore: key=[COMMAND_PATROL_SINGLE], class=[M5], race=null
* global script map: set: key=[COMMAND_PATROL_SCOUT], class=[M5], race=null, script='!ship.cmd.patrol.scout.std', prio=0
* global script map: set: key=[COMMAND_PATROL_MULTI], class=[Big Ship], race=null, script='!ship.cmd.patrol.multi.std', prio=0
* global script map: set: key=[COMMAND_PIRATE_PLUNDERSHIPS], class=[TS], race=null, script='!job.pirate.plunderships', prio=0
* global script map: set: key=[COMMAND_INVASION], class=[Ship], race=null, script='!ship.cmd.invasion.std', prio=0
* global script map: set: key=[COMMAND_MOVETOBOARD], class=[Astronaut], race=null, script='!ship.cmd.movetoboard.std', prio=0
* - Fleet commands -----------------
* Replacement for "Call To Arms".
* "Join with".
* "Invade sector".
* "Protect" (ship or station).
* "Attack all enemies".
* "Patrol sectors".
* Old fleet commands
* global script map: set: key=[COMMAND_FLEET_ATTACKALLENEMIES], class=[Ship], race=null, script='!ship.cmd.fleet.attackall.std', prio=0
* global script map: set: key=[COMMAND_FLEET_ATTACK], class=[Ship], race=null, script='!ship.cmd.fleet.attack.std', prio=0
* global script map: set: key=[COMMAND_FLEET_RESUPPLY], class=[Ship], race=null, script='!ship.cmd.fleet.resupply', prio=0
* global script map: set: key=[COMMAND_WAR_DEFENDSECTOR], class=[Ship], race=null, script='!ship.cmd.war.defend.std', prio=0
* global script map: set: key=[COMMAND_WAR_INVADESECTORS], class=[Ship], race=null, script='!ship.cmd.war.invadesectors', prio=0
* Mayhem 3.16
* global secondary signal map: remove signal=[SIGNAL_DAMAGED] race=null class=[Moveable Ship] name='!ship.signal.damaged'
* global secondary signal map: add signal=[SIGNAL_DAMAGED] race=null class=[Moveable Ship] script='!ship.signal.damaged' prio=800 name='!ship.signal.damaged'
* Don't remove that signal. Mayhem destroys laser towers with Mayhem.Signal.RemoveLasertower.

sval.val: Initialisation for all ships with any race
set default scripts for all ships with any race
Navigation Commands
global script map: set: key=[COMMAND_JUMP_STATION], class=[Moveable Ship], race=null, script='!ship.cmd.jumpstation.std', prio=0
global script map: set: key=[COMMAND_JUMP_SECTOR], class=[Moveable Ship], race=null, script='!ship.cmd.jump.std', prio=0

Defend position uses the following command:

Mayhem 3.16
global secondary signal map: remove signal=[SIGNAL_DAMAGED] race=null class=[Moveable Ship] name='!ship.signal.damaged'
global secondary signal map: add signal=[SIGNAL_DAMAGED] race=null class=[Moveable Ship] script='!ship.signal.damaged' prio=800 name='!ship.signal.damaged'
Don't remove that signal. Mayhem destroys laser towers with Mayhem.Signal.RemoveLasertower.
